column4: hey guys. i have been a windows user for a while now. and i am strongly suggesting the switch to linux. i love all the open-source software that i use on windows (firefox, openoffice, xchat) but i need to have adobe products and autodesk 3DSMax. is there a possibility that in the future these software companies will start developing for linux?
maybe blender3d would be an ok alternative for you in place of 3DSMax
VRay Renderer is a necessity though, and there is no version of vray for blender afaik..
